verses.verse: A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph<s%>. O <S%H430>God<s%>, the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> are <S%H935>come<s%> into thine <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>; thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1964>temple<s%> have they <S%H2930>defiled<s%>; they have <S%H7760>laid<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> on <S%H5856>heaps<s%>. of: or, for

The dead <S%H5038>bodies<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> have they <S%H5414>given<s%> to be <S%H3978>meat<s%> unto the <S%H5775>fowls<s%> of the <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of thy <S%H2623>saints<s%> unto the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
Their <S%H1818>blood<s%> have they <S%H8210>shed<s%> like <S%H4325>water<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>; and there was none to <S%H6912>bury<s%> them.
We are become a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> to our <S%H7934>neighbours<s%>, a <S%H3933>scorn<s%> and <S%H7047>derision<s%> to them that are round <S%H5439>about<s%> us.
How long, <S%H3068>LORD<s%>? wilt thou be <S%H599>angry<s%> for <S%H5331>ever<s%>? shall thy <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> <S%H1197>burn<s%> like <S%H784>fire<s%>?

Pour <S%H8210>out<s%> thy <S%H2534>wrath<s%> upon the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> that have not <S%H3045>known<s%> thee, and upon the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> that have not <S%H7121>called<s%> upon thy <S%H8034>name<s%>.
For they have <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and laid <S%H8074>waste<s%> his dwelling <S%H5116>place<s%>.

O <S%H2142>remember<s%> not against us <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H5771>iniquities<s%>: let thy tender <S%H7356>mercies<s%> <S%H4118>speedily<s%> <S%H6923>prevent<s%> us: for we are <S%H1809>brought<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1809>low<s%>. former: or, the iniquities of them that were before us

<S%H5826>Help<s%> us, O <S%H430>God<s%> of our <S%H3468>salvation<s%>, <S%H1697>for<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of thy <S%H8034>name<s%>: and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> us, and purge <S%H3722>away<s%> our <S%H2403>sins<s%>, for thy <S%H8034>name's<s%> sake.

Wherefore should the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> <S%H559>say<s%>, Where is their <S%H430>God<s%>? let him be <S%H3045>known<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> in our <S%H5869>sight<s%> by the <S%H5360>revenging<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> which is <S%H8210>shed<s%>. revenging: Heb. vengeance

Let the <S%H603>sighing<s%> of the <S%H615>prisoner<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee; according to the <S%H1433>greatness<s%> of thy <S%H2220>power<s%> <S%H3498>preserve<s%> thou those that are <S%H1121>appointed<s%> to <S%H8546>die<s%>; thy: Heb. thine arm preserve: Heb. reserve the children of death

And <S%H7725>render<s%> unto our <S%H7934>neighbours<s%> <S%H7659>sevenfold<s%> into their <S%H2436>bosom<s%> their <S%H2781>reproach<s%>, wherewith they have <S%H2778>reproached<s%> thee, O <S%H136>Lord<s%>.

So we thy <S%H5971>people<s%> and <S%H6629>sheep<s%> of thy <S%H4830>pasture<s%> will give thee <S%H3034>thanks<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>: we will shew <S%H5608>forth<s%> thy <S%H8416>praise<s%> to <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%>. to all: Heb. to generation and generation
